ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Help
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I have heard reports of people having their gear and money deleted while their characters and levels were still there. So there s no guarantee that
ygData.messageBody:
> > Second off, old accounts can NOT be reactivated just like that.
> > EverQuest holds onto your unused and unpaid for accounts for six
> > months before deleting it.
> No, they guarantee they won't delete accounts for 6 months, but they
> have never yet actually deleted an inactive account. I know of several
> people who have returned after a year or more and just reactivated their
> account
> Matt
>
Well, I have heard reports of people having their gear and money deleted
while their characters and levels were still there. So there's no guarantee
that you can just pick up where you left off.
luv,
-Su
